src:
Mau Bangkit, MU Perlu Belajar Memenangkan Pertandingan dengan Cara Jelek
06 Nov 2019, 20:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Penyerang Manchester United, Marcus Rashford mengomentari sejumlah hasil buruk timnya sejak awal musim ini. Rashford menilai timnya sulit meraih kemenangan karena mereka belum belajar memenangkan pertandingan dengan cara yang jelek.
Performa Manchester United di awal musim ini memang menjadi sorotan. Setan Merah kerap bermain inkonsisten sehingga mereka kerap kehilangan poin, terutama melawan tim-tim yang tidak diunggulkan.
Berkat kegemaran buang-buang poin mereka, United kini berada di papan tengah klasemen sementara EPL. Mereka hanya mengoleksi 13 poin dari 11 pertandingan sehingga mereka menempati peringkat 10.
Rashford sendiri mengakui bahwa penampilan timnya belakangan ini masih jauh dari kata optimal. "Konsistensi dalam performa dan konsistensi di pertandingan yang anda menangkan adalah dua hal yang berbeda," ujar Rashford kepada Sky Sports.

Baca komentar lengkap sang striker di bawah ini.
text:
Want to Rise, MU Needs to Learn to Win the Game the Bad Way
Nov 6 2019, 20:40 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United striker Marcus Rashford has commented on a number of his team's poor results since the beginning of this season. Rashford assessed that his team had difficulty winning because they had not learned to win the game in a bad way.
Manchester United's performance at the beginning of this season was in the spotlight. Red Devils often play inconsistently so they often lose points, especially against teams that are not seeded.
Thanks to the penchant for wasting their points, United are now in the middle of the EPL standings. They only collected 13 points from 11 matches so they ranked 10th.
Rashford himself admitted that his team's recent form was far from optimal. "Consistency in performance and consistency in the matches you win are two different things," Rashford told Sky Sports.

Read the striker's full comments below.
